title: Corner the Con Man
resume: Corner the Con Man is a TVB television series, premiering in 1997. The theme song "Splendid Story", and subtheme song "Has You Rarely" was composed by Joseph Koo, lyrics by Wong Jim, arrangement by Joseph Koo and Chiu Tsang Hei, and sung by Roman Tam.
